attributes.action: Give reserve Sutton United goalkeeper Wayne Shaw an OBE
attributes.additional_details: He has overcome his challenges of his obesity, hoovers up for Sutton before games and even coaches Sutton's goalkeepers. (And he also gets hammered at half time)
attributes.background: This man clearly embodies the Great British spirit and surely deserves to be awarded for his heroism

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
